eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkCancelled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the RecoveryManager role is transferred.

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkFulfilled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the RecoveryManager role is transferred.

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkRequested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the RecoveryManager role is transferred.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the RecoveryManager role is transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: newRecoveryManager
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the new RecoveryManager.

parameterDecorators.name: previousRecoveryManager
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the previous RecoveryManager.

functionDecorators.name: fulfill
functionDecorators.description: Receives the response in the form of uint256.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updatePrice
functionDecorators.description: Creates a Chainlink request to retrieve API response and finds the target data in the form of uint256. Response is multiplied by 100000 to remove decimal places from data.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawLink
functionDecorators.description: A withdraw function to avoid locking LINK in the contract.
